result.eng: We were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.
result.ga: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maithe
result.orig: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maithe
result.html: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maitheWe were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí frustraċas orainn mar ġeall ar an easpa foclóirí maiṫeWe were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.
